The above Dharma gate items.
Ennin.
In the eighth month of the fifth year of the JÅwa era, I arrived at Yangzhou, the Great General Prefecture of the Great Tang.
I visited various temples in the city.
I copied the above.
Here, the Venerable Zongrui of Zhongnan Mountain, whose learning surpassed that of his predecessors,
Understood and penetrated the profound principles.
He was able to understand Sanskrit and Chinese.
He was wonderfully familiar with the sounds of the Siddham letters.
He was going to the Western Heaven to say goodbye to the old.
Ennin was fortunate to have met him.
He received the study of the Sanskrit Siddham letters.
And he also studied the Sanskrit and Chinese languages.
He also met the great Tang court priest, the great ÄcÄrya Hong, and his Dharma heir, the ÄcÄrya QuanyÃ©.
He consulted and received the secret Dharma.
The Venerable was moved by the sincerity from afar.
He entrusted him with the secret essentials.
He then instructed him in the method of reciting the mantra.
And the maá¹‡á¸ala patterns of both the Womb and Vajra sections.
Later, he intended to ask about Tiantai.
Because the journey was far and the round trip would take too long,
there was an imperial decree not allowing him to go.
His regret was hard to bear.
Although the Dharma gates he sought were not yet complete,
he recorded the scrolls and examined them as listed.
On the 20th day of the 4th month in the 4th year of the Kai-cheng era of the Great Tang Dynasty, which was the 36th year of the sexagenary cycle.
Recorded by the Dharma Master Wei Yuanren, who requested to learn from the Tiantai school and transmitted the lamp.
